member.name: T:Catalyst.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.FilterControlMode
member.summary: The type of filter to perform.

member.name: F:Catalyst.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.FilterControlMode.Equals
member.summary: Returns true if the parameter value is equal to the property

member.name: F:Catalyst.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.FilterControlMode.Contains
member.summary: Applies to Strings only. Returns true if the property contains the string in the parameter value

member.name: F:Catalyst.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.FilterControlMode.Range
member.summary: Returns true if the value lies in between the bounds supplied by the parameter value

member.name: F:Catalyst.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.FilterControlMode.MultiSelect
member.summary: Returns true if any of the values provided by the parameter equal the suppled value
